properties.entry: UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_NM = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_INTRODUCE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO, ITEM_DATE, CATEGORY_CD, ITEM_STATUS_CD, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, IMG_PATH, IMG_NM FROM ITEM LEFT JOIN ITEM_IMG USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT POSTSCRIRT_NO, POSTSCRIRT_CHECK, SHOP_NO, MEMBER_NO, SHOP_NM FROM POSTSCRIPT JOIN SHOP USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SHOP_NO = ? AND POSTSCRIPT_STATUS_CD = 0 ORDER BY 1
UPDATE POSTSCRIPT SET POSTSCRIRT_CHECK = ? WHERE POSTSCRIRT_NO = ?
UPDATE POSTSCRIPT SET POSTSCRIPT_STATUS_CD = 1 WHERE POSTSCRIRT_NO = ?
